name: To USB
description:
TO USB

OBJECTIVE: Find and plug your flashdrive into the USB port. Simple enough, right?

CONTROLS 

[w] - forward 

[s] - backward

[a] - rotate counterclockwise

[d] - rotate clockwise 

[mouse] - angle up/down

"To USB" is a difficult 3D platformer inspired by games such as "I Am Bread" made as part of the Lost Relic Games Game Jam 2022 based on the theme "connection."
